This entry details the 1989 video game UFO, published by Sublogic for MS-DOS.

Gameplay ðŸ”—

This section explains the core gameplay of UFO. The player controls an alien flying saucer with the objective of harvesting energy from humans by inducing fear.

Reception ðŸ”—

This section summarizes the critical reception of the game. Daniel Hockman of Computer Gaming World reviewed the game, noting its uniqueness and challenging flight demands. He suggested that players looking for something different and willing to overlook the polygon graphics might enjoy it.
